word_mean: 离心的，离中的，离大脑皮质的，传出的，输出的

sentence.Network_en: The juice is extracted by centrifugal force.
sentence.Network_cn: 果汁是通过离心力榨取的。

sentence.Network_en: The civil war reinforced the centrifugal tendencies at work within the economy.
sentence.Network_cn: 內战加剧了经济领域的离心倾向.

sentence.Network_en: The division of Europe into warring blocs produces ever - increasing centrifugal stress.
sentence.Network_cn: 把欧洲分为作战集团产生了越来越大的离心效果.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from modern Latin centrifugus, from Latin centrum (see centre) + -fugus 'fleeing' (from fugere 'flee')

means.word_mean: 1. tending to move away from a center;
2. tending away from centralization, as of authority;

sentences.sentence: "the division of Europe into warring blocs produces ever-increasing centrifugal stress"

means.word_mean: 3. conveying information to the muscles from the CNS;

centr中心+e→n.中心, 中央 v.集中

sentences.en: Centrifugal machines are connected to the motor drive directly instead of through a gearbox.
sentences.cn: 离心机不通过调速箱直接与电机驱动装置相连。
